body.name: Koonmi Black Floor Mirror Full Length, 64"x21" Rounded Corner Full Length Mirror with Stand, Hanging or Leaning Against Wall, Aluminum Alloy Frame Dressing Mirror for Living Room, Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 39 mins
features: 【Full Length Mirror】:Our rounded corner mirror full length allows you to see your entire body from head to toe, making it easy to not only admire your whole body, but also make your space look better

【High-Quality】:Our full length free standing mirrors are precision crafted with moisture and rust resistant aluminium frames to ensure durability and a classic look. In addition, the back of the floor mirror is laminated with explosion-proof film to prevent you and your family from being harmed after the mirror breaks

【HD Imaging & Nano Mirror】:Our full body mirror is designed to render natural, undistorted reflections through HD imaging and cutting-edge nano-mirror technology, highlighting every detail so you can experience unparalleled clarity

【Multifunctional】:Our floor body mirrors can be mounted against a wall or hung freestanding anywhere. It can be hung vertically or horizontally. It can be widely used as bathroom mirror, bedroom freestanding mirror, living room standing mirror, dining room wall mounted mirror, cloakroom floor mirror, home gym wide full body mirror, entrance hallway full mirror, wardrobe hanging mirror

【Hassle-Free Purchase】:Our product philosophy is to let you enjoy a hassle-free purchasing experience, each of our free standing mirrors is securely packaged in a honeycomb cardboard box, in case of damage or deformation, we will promptly provide a replacement or refund service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Heavy, and Very Clear
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful, heavy, and exceptionally clear full-length mirror. It can stand on its own, or be wall-mounted vertically or horizontally over a credenza, sofa, etc. This will go in our summer house, which currently has only a very old mirror that has lost much of it’s silvering. This item arrived intact and well-protected. The narrow gold frame works well with our style. It arrived well protected and intact. We are very pleased with this item, and recommend it as an excellent buy, particularly with free shipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy frame with simple lines
reviews.reviewText: This mirror has a good solid picture frame like stand and also has vertical hangers (through there aren't horizontal ones). It is made of a solid metal material so it has some weight to it.The lines are clean and it really is stunning in a corner of my house-- it brings a lot of light from its opposing window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can’t risk 7 years of bad luck…
reviews.reviewText: This mirror scares me a little, because, while it reflects a clear crisp image, it’s a little on the thin side and a tad flimsy to lean against a wall with a rambunctious puppy that my clumsy husband likes to play fetch with in the house. Because I don’t need 7 years of bad luck, I plan to hang mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality full length mirror
reviews.reviewText: I'm in love with this mirror! It's a great size, sturdy, and versatile, allowing horizontal, vertical, or freestanding display. Though the seams around the corners are a minor drawback, I prefer a continuous piece. I will say that once it's hung on the back of my door the seems really weren't that noticeable. The gold-framed mirror, is stunning, offering a natural, undistorted reflection. It's versatile for hanging, leaning, or using its own stand. The aluminum alloy frame is well-constructed, making the space look bigger. It's a fantastic value, heavy-duty with an elegant gold frame, resembling a high-end store purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks amazingly high end for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This is hands-down one of the best things I've ordered from Amazon in terms of value for money. This mirror is heavy duty (but I was still able to lug it upstairs myself) and has a nice stand and elegant gold frame. It looks great using the stand or just propped against a wall. It honestly looks like something purchased for several hundred dollars from a big brand home decor store--I'm sure it's a dupe for something trendy that I'm not even aware of!It came very well packaged (pro tip: cut the tape along the thin edges to separate the two pieces of the box) and the only annoying part of it is figuring out how to dispose of the super-sturdy box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been in search of a full length mirror for awhile, this one is great! The mirror was packaged well in the box and arrived in perfect condition. It looks nice and seems well made. I don’t notice any disruption in the glass. I’m using this as a freestanding mirror and didn’t anchor it to the wall, but you can anchor it (hardware included) or use the leg on the back to prop it up. This mirror is longer and wider than my other full length mirrors and I like that. Overall I really like this and would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This black framed vertical or horizontal displayed mirror is stunning. The mirror has a natural, undistorted reflection and is approximately 64" X 21" complete. You can display it hanging, leaning, or it has its own stand for all by itself standing. The frame is an aluminum alloy and has good quality construction. It definitely will make the space you have look bigger. I would recommend even for just this. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with this mirror. It is a really good size, sturdy, and versatile. You can hang it horizontally, vertically, or use it freestanding. It goes with just about any kind of style. The only thing I did not like were these very small seams around the corners. I would’ve preferred it if it was all one continuous piece.
